Articles.Content:
Then Big Boss wouldnt be the only Boss.

What if all humanity was to have eyes on the back side of the head?

then we would be extinct by predators since we cant see whats in front of us

what if earth had a secondary small moon like kerbin got minmus?

We'd have built gigantic ice cream factories there and ice cream would get cheaper.

What if Earth was a moon orbiting gas giant?

then we would die because of his radiation

what if a kerbal landed on earth?

AREA 51

What if I met Randall Munroe?

Youd die from randall munroeness.

What if i was a girl?

Then you probably (not to be sexist) wouldn't be playing KSP

What if I was a Twitch Streamer?

You'd get rich with your filmed version of cziken20's boy-to-girl transformation going viral.

What if we move Earth further awy from the sun? AU = AU + 5%

Then the coldness offsets the global warming a little bit.

What if I convert my TI-84 to a TI-89?

*You'd spend about 30 dollars less than if you would've just bought a a T-89 calculator in the first place.*

(Oh god, genderswapping, genderswapping everywhere...)

What if free will was real, and not just an illusion?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-26T03:30:35Z" title="08/26/2015 03:30  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 26, 2015</time> by NeatCrown**

Then humanity might actually exist. If it were to apply to today's mentality though, it would be exploited to no end. I would never leave the house.

What if I'm not real, and you're all crazy?

Then i'd feel REALLY lonely! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

What if i had never got into war of insanity in the first place?

I don't know.

What if these aren't really words, and this is all in the matrix?

"Words" would be different depending on where it is spoken.

*"A single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing, used with others (or sometimes alone) to form a sentence and typically shown with a space on either side when written or printed."* Anywhere else in the universe, another species' words can be *not ours* and exist only there, or only here.

If you meany "worlds", then: [http://www.smbc-comics.com/?id=2535](http://www.smbc-comics.com/?id=2535)

What if Germany won WWII?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-26T19:05:46Z" title="08/26/2015 07:05  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 26, 2015</time> by NeatCrown**

Then you would not be able to ask this question, making me unable to answer, meaning this answer is invalid, which means I never answered your question that doesn't exist.

What if my answers made sense to a regular person?

then people would understand it

What if SSTOs were easier to do?

Then there would be human-SSTO hybrids everywhere

Then there would already be homes, malls, and a bunch of other infrastructure in orbit, and potentially a base on Luna.

What if all your base are belong to us?

You would still be outnumbered, since you only managed to capture a single of our bases. 

What if homework did not exist?
The world would be a better place, as stress levels would be far lower.

\***Rebooting systems**!\*

------------------------------

What if all the countries in the world worked as technocracies?

What's that?

What if xannari and i broke up? (Don't worry xan, i don't want to break up)

How I feel would depend on the reason.

What if I didn't become the primary target of everything for a single world of warships game?

> 
> Rate of how many times I've been set on fire per shot has increased, as well as every other special damage category.
> 
> I have been the victim of the torpedo glitches for 19 games in a row regardless of my fixes.
> 
> I have become the primary target in every game tonight regardless of how many allies are nearby, as if they hate me specifically, even though I know no one there.
> 
> This may push me into leaving, or unleashing a virus onto the server.

Then you wouldn't need to git gud.

What if Squad didn't release 1.0 and the PS4, XBOX, and Wii U ports and instead continued along in beta?

then the community would be crazy

what if SR-71 was free?

Then they'd run out of SR-71s.

What if Squad makes an HO scale port of KSP?
